TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProjectFileConverter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Converts a [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] project file to the [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/add/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] project file format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets a value indicating whether the last attempted conversion was skipped because the project file is already in the latest format.
Docs.value: if the last attempted conversion was skipped because the project file is already in the latest format; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets a list of warnings generated during the conversion.
Docs.value: A string array containing any warnings generated during the conversion.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Convert() cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts the project specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.OldProjectFile%2A> property and saves it in the file specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.NewProjectFile%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Convert(valuetype Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ProjectLoadSettings projectLoadSettings) cil managed

Docs.param: A flag that determine whether the project ignores non-existent .target files when loading.
Docs.summary: Converts the project specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.OldProjectFile%2A> property and saves it in the file specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.NewProjectFile%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Convert(string msbuildBinPath) cil managed

Docs.param: The fully qualified path to MSBuild.exe.
Docs.summary: This is the entry point method, which performs the project file format conversion. This method will overwrite "newProjectFile" if it already exists, so the caller of this method should confirm with the user that that's what he really wants to do.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement ConvertInMemory() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new project in memory from the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.OldProjectFile%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project ConvertInMemory(class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine engine) cil managed

Docs.param: The in which to create the new project.
Docs.summary: Creates a new project in memory from the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.OldProjectFile%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project ConvertInMemory(class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine engine, valuetype Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ProjectLoadSettings projectLoadSettings) cil managed

Docs.param: The in which to create the new project.
A flag that determines whether the project ignores non-existent .target files when loading.
Docs.summary: This is the entry point method, which performs the project file format conversion. This method will simply create a new MSBuild Project object in memory, instead of trying to write it to disk.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool FSharpSpecificConversions(bool actuallyMakeChanges) cil managed

Docs.param: if true, make the changes, otherwise, don't actually make any changes, but return whether you would make the changes
Docs.summary:
Performs conversions specific to F# projects (VS2008 CTP -> VS2012) and (VS2010 -> VS2012).
This involves: changing the location of FSharp targets, and for 2008CTP, adding explicit mscorlib and FSharp.Core references.
Docs.returns: Returns true if anything was (would be) changed, false otherwise.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the project file being converted is a .user file.
Docs.value: if the project file being converted is a .user file; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the new project file name.
Docs.value: A string representing the new project file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This value must be set before running the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.Convert%2A> method.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the old project file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This value must be set before running the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.Convert%2A> method.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the solution file that contains the project being converted.
Docs.value: The name of the solution file that contains the project being converted.
